plot: Caillou tries his hand at being family photographer and discovers it can be a pretty tricky job. Caillou and Leo can't find Caillou's airplane anywhere but their hunt through the house turns up all sort of other lost items. After getting caught in the rain, Caillou loses his voice. Caillou is invited to Leo's birthday party and is overjoyed when he discovers there will be a magician present.—Anonymous
